trans-unit.source: Defines <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> criteria to select part-level or package-level relationships.
trans-unit.target: Definiert <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" />-Kriterien für die Auswahl von Beziehungen auf Partebene oder Paketebene.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> method of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> class to specify a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts to be signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> wird verwendet, indem Sie die <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.Sign%2A> Methode der <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager> Klasse, um eine Liste der anzugeben <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> Teile signiert werden soll.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> is used by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> property of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> class to obtain a list of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts that have been signed with the given digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector> wird verwendet, indem Sie die <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignedRelationshipSelectors%2A> Eigenschaft der <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> Klasse zum Abrufen einer Liste von <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> Teile, die mit der angegebenen digitalen Signatur signiert wurden.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/") that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Der [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] von <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> oder <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> (<c>SourceUri</c>="/"), der der Besitzer der Beziehung ist.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <c>selectionCriteria</c>, either by relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or relationship <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Der Typ der <c>selectionCriteria</c>, entweder nach Beziehung <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> oder nach Beziehung <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" />.

trans-unit.source: The qualification string that is used to select the relationships based on the <c>selectorType</c>.
trans-unit.target: Der Qualifizierungspfad, der verwendet wird, um die Beziehungen anhand des <c>selectorType</c> auszuwählen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector" />-Klasse.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> or <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceUri" /> oder <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> ist <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="selectorType" />-Parameter ist ungültig.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="selectorType" /> parameter is <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> but <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> is not a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="selectorType" />-Parameter ist <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" />, jedoch ist <paramref name="selectionCriteria" /> keine gültige [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xsd](~/includes/tlasharptla-xsd-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceUri" /> is not the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> root ("/") and is also not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Der <paramref name="sourceUri" /> ist nicht der <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />-Stamm ("/") und kein gültiger <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The package from which to select the relationships based on the selection criteria.
trans-unit.target: Das Paket, aus dem die Beziehungen anhand der Auswahlkriterien ausgewählt werden sollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> objects that match the defined <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" />, and <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" />.
trans-unit.target: Gibt eine Liste von <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" />-Objekten zurück, die mit dem definierten <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SourceUri" />, dem definierten <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> und den definierten <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectionCriteria" /> übereinstimmen.

trans-unit.source: A list of relationships that match the selection parameters specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Eine Liste von Beziehungen, die mit den für den <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />-Konstruktor angegebenen Auswahlparametern übereinstimmen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the selection criteria specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die für den <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />-Konstruktor angegebenen Auswahlkriterien ab.

trans-unit.source: The selection criteria based on the <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" /> of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Die Auswahlkriterien auf der Grundlage des für den <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.SelectorType" />-Konstruktor angegebenen <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> (<see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> oder <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den für den <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType" />-Konstruktor angegebenen <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> ab.

trans-unit.source: The selector type of <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Der für den <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Id" />-Konstruktor angegebene Auswahltyp <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType.Type" /> oder <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den Stammpaket-URI ("/") oder Part-<see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> ab, der für den <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />-Konstruktor als Besitzer der Beziehung angegeben wurde.

trans-unit.source: The root package URI ("/") or part <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" /> specified to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" /> constructor as the owner of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Der Stammpaket-URI ("/") oder Part-<see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri" />, der für den <see cref="M:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelector.#ctor(System.Uri,System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationshipSelectorType,System.String)" />-Konstruktor als Besitzer der Beziehung angegeben wurde.
